definition: the wider world/diverse aspects of society
surname Shi
life/age/generation/era/world/lifetime/epoch/descendant/noble
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
variant of 麵|面[mian4]
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to see the world/to broaden one's horizons

sentences.english: She had seen the world and lived with great people and raised herself far beyond her original humble station.
sentences.chinese: 她见过了世面，结识了大人物，地位比从前高得多。

sentences.english: Maybe you think you've seen just about everything!
sentences.chinese: 别以为你已经见过世面，什么都见过了。

sentences.english: He hated society and had little desire to go out and see the world again.
sentences.chinese: 他痛恨社会，不再想出去见世面了。

sentences.english: I haven't seen so much of the world as he.
sentences.chinese: 我见过的世面没有他那么多。

sentences.english: If I win a lot of money I want to see the world.
sentences.chinese: 如果我赢了很多钱，我想去见见世面。

sentences.english: Grew up in small towns, never seen the world was his reason.
sentences.chinese: 生长在小城镇，没见过世面是他的理由。

sentences.english: He's a businessman. I'll make him an offer he can't refuse.
sentences.chinese: 他见过世面，谅必不会拒绝我的条件。

sentences.english: For the first time in her life, mom and dad took her out to meet the world.
sentences.chinese: 今天爸爸妈妈带着花花第一次出去见世面。

sentences.english: We ought to face the world and brave the storm.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该经风雨，见世面。

sentences.english: Young as she is , she has seen much of the world.
sentences.chinese: 她虽然年轻，却见过很多世面。

sentences.english: However, we want to see the world, and we enjoy adventure. I am no exeeption.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我们都想见世面，闯天下，我也不例外。

sentences.english: You have seen the world and you know why it hurts.
sentences.chinese: 你已经见过世面，知道为什么会让人痛心。

sentences.english: He had travelled far, had seen much of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他曾经远游，见过许多世面。

sentences.english: Sailors do not earn much money but they do see life.
sentences.chinese: 海员们挣钱不多，但他们确实能见世面。

sentences.english: She's obviously been around a lot.
This is my first child. He has not seen any society, so he is always shy and awkward.
sentences.chinese: 这是第一个孩子，没有见过世面，老是躲躲闪闪的。

definition: to see the world/to broaden one's horizons
to gain first-hand knowledge of sth/to experience for oneself/knowledge/experience/insight
to travel extensively
broaden, expand one's horizons
experienced and knowledgeable (idiom)
country bumpkin/boor/unsophisticated country person (humble, applied to oneself)/burial mound
ken/scope
to leave home to make one's way in the world/to leave the life one knows to seek success
the first time/for the first time
(derog.) villager/hick/bumpkin
for the first time/on the previous occasion/last time (something occurred)
country folk/rustic/rural folk
ability/capability
ostentation/a show of extravagance/grand style/red tape
hillbilly/yokel/redneck/bumpkin
to seem/to appear/(in a negative or interrogative sentence) to be sure
